block.p: Lora Abe Foster, a cosmetics executive, and Kevin Patrick Nee, an investment manager, were married yesterday. The Rev. Michael L. Lindvall performed the ceremony at Brick Presbyterian Church in New York.

Mrs. Nee, 37, is the executive director of strategic planning in New York for Estée Lauder brands. She graduated from Stanford and received an M.B.A. from Columbia. She is the daughter of Floria S. Abe and Harry H. Abe of Aiea, Hawaii.
The couple were married Saturday at Brick Presbyterian Church in New York.

Lora Abe Foster, a cosmetics executive, and Kevin Patrick Nee, an investment manager, were married yesterday. The Rev. Michael L. Lindvall performed the ceremony at Brick Presbyterian Church in New York.

Mrs. Nee, 37, is the executive director of strategic planning in New York for Estée Lauder brands. She graduated from Stanford and received an M.B.A. from Columbia. She is the daughter of Floria S. Abe and Harry H. Abe of Aiea, Hawaii.
The bride's previous marriage ended in divorce.

Mr. Nee, 42, is a partner and a portfolio manager in the New York office of the Quellos Group, an investment company. He graduated from Villanova and also received an M.B.A. from Columbia. He is a son of Dolores C. Nee of Holmdel, N.J., and the late Patrick J. Nee.
